sentences.sContent: One of the neighbors complained about the noise from the party.
sentences.sCn: 有位邻居抱怨聚会太吵。

sentences.sContent: FBI agents were interviewing all their friends and neighbors.
sentences.sCn: 联邦调查局人员正在向他们所有的朋友和邻居问话。

sentences.sContent: Our next-door neighbours (= the people who live in the house next to us ) say they’ll look after our cat for us while we’re away.
sentences.sCn: 我们隔壁的邻居说，我们不在时他们会照顾我们的猫。

words.tran: 睦邻的；友好的；邻居似的
像邻居的；亲切的；睦邻的
邻近；周围；邻居关系；附近一带
与…为邻；位于附近（neighbor的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: someone who lives next to you or near you
